5.eng-name: Establishing the Prayer and the Sunnah Regarding Them

hadiths.text: It was narrated that Abu Hurairah said:“The Prophet (ﷺ) came out to pray and said the Takbir, then he gestured to them to wait. He went and took a bath, and his head was dripping with water while he led them in prayer. When he finished he said: ‘I came out to you in a state of sexual impurity, and I forgot until I had started to pray.’”

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الْبِنَاءِ عَلَى الصَّلاَةِ
chapter.eng-name: What was narrated concerning resuming the Prayer
